description: For every inch you skin uphill and every turn you make on the way down, fit matters. So does keeping warm. The Blackcomb Eco 3/4 bottom is the perfect balance for both, eliminating bulk when it's not needed while performing when circumstances require nothing but focus. A stylish and versatile high-performance layer ideally suited to finding your flow.
name: Odlo Blackcomb Eco 3/4 Bottoms - Mens
